p: Apart from M. natalensis and M. erythroleucus, 6 other small mammal taxa were also IgG positive: Praomys daltoni ( n = 6 individuals), Mus baoulei ( n = 5), Rattus rattus ( n = 2) , Crocidura spp. ( n = 2), Mus minutoides ( n = 1) and Praomys misonnei ( n = 1). Praomys daltoni, P. misonnei and Crocidura spp. were only seropositive in the localities where M. natalensis and H. pamfi were LASV-positive. The remaining species were seropositive in both LASV-positive and LASV-negative localities (Fig. 1, Table 1).
